section.title: Services
section.para: The applications Controller, Connector and Client Web are installed as services.

To start/stop/restart all installed services use: service shongo [start|stop|restart]
To start/stop/restart single service use:
service shongo-controller [start|stop|restart] service shongo-connector [start|stop|restart] service shongo-client-web [start|stop|restart]
To show status of all installed services use: service shongo status
To show status of single services use: service [shongo-controller|shongo-connector|shongo-client-web] status

section.title: Logs
section.para: Log files from application services (shongo-controller, shongo-connector and shongo-client-web) can be found in /var/log/shongo/ directory. The directory contains a file for each startup of each service.
If you have started a shongo-controller service at 12:30 on 2014-01-01 you can find it's log file here: /var/log/shongo/shongo-controller_2014-01-01T12:30.log
